headline: Trump Media to Enter Booming Prediction Markets Business
summary: Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. plans to make prediction contracts available on its Truth Social network, allowing users to bet on events ranging from political elections to inflation-rate changes, according to a statement on Tuesday.  The initiative adds to recent efforts by Trump Media to capitalize on its retail following and comes just after trading volume on the leading marketplaces, Polymarket and Kalshi, hit a fresh record.  Investors’ voracious appetite for betting on real-world events has prompted firms like CME Group Inc. and Intercontinental Exchange Inc. to look for ways into the business.

headline: Shutdown clouds Federal Reserve interest rate cut decision
summary: Should investors, businesses, and consumers expect interest rates to continue to drop through the end of this year and into the next? The answer depends on a divisive Federal Reserve, the nation’s independent central bank which sets monetary policy by balancing inflation and jobs to control the ...
